Gensokyo:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

Gensokyo:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
Gensokyo:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

Gensokyo:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.

Gensokyo:PerfectCherryBlossom.NAME: Perfect Cherry Blossom
Gensokyo:PerfectCherryBlossom.FLAVOR: A favor bestowed upon you for befriending a lonely girl.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you die, kill ALL enemies.

Gensokyo:Mercy.NAME: Mercy
Gensokyo:Mercy.FLAVOR: It is mercy, not justice or courage or even heroism, that alone can defeat evil.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBlock at the end of your turn.

Gensokyo:Justice.NAME: Justice
Gensokyo:Justice.FLAVOR: The dead cannot cry out for justice. It is a duty of the living to do so for them.
DESCRIPTIONS: damage to ALL enemies at the end of your turn.
